Summary: Biochemical reaction from oxycodone to noroxycodone. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A.
Biochemical reaction from oxycodone to 6beta-oxycodol hydrochloride.
Biochemical reaction from oxymorphone to oxymorphone 3-glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT2B7.
Biochemical reaction from noroxycodone to noroxymorphone. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from oxycodone to oxycodone-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B7 or UGT2B4.
Biochemical reaction from oxycodone to oxymorphone. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from noroxycodone to noroxycodone-glucuronide.
Biochemical reaction from oxymorphone to noroxymorphone. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP2D6.
